nodes.text: Misch'an was a pilot who sometimes served in the Rebel Alliance's Red Squadron aboard the MC80 Home One type Star Cruiser Independence during the Galactic Civil War. A popular pilot, Misch'an was often seen with fellow pilots Karka and Dontal aboard the Independence. Along with Karka and Dontal, Misch'an was killed in the Battle of Brigia during Operation Strike Fear.
